msg: some style changes, doc fixes (non-wildcard patterns are store upper-case), some minor optimizations and some additional memoization of File.list() that may actually improve performance

author: jeremias
msg: Fix for PFMReader after bug #43089 (r567078) changed the behavior of PFMFile. Fixes baseline problems when Type 1 fonts are used in conjunction with XML font metric files.
